mapper.insert: INSERT INTO pageon.comment (type, bnum, fnum, rnum, cnum, content, user_id) VALUES (#{type}, #{bnum}, #{fnum}, #{rnum}, #{cnum}, #{content}, #{user_id})
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM pageon.comment WHERE (type = 'forum' AND fnum = #{fnum} AND cnum = 0) OR (type = 'review' AND rnum = #{rnum} AND cnum = 0) OR (type = 'board' AND bnum = #{bnum} AND cnum = 0) ORDER BY wdate ASC LIMIT #{startRow}, #{pageBlock}
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM pageon.comment WHERE (type = 'forum' AND fnum = #{fnum} AND cnum = 0) OR (type = 'review' AND rnum = #{rnum} AND cnum = 0) OR (type = 'board' AND bnum = #{bnum} AND cnum = 0)
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM pageon.comment WHERE cnum = #{cnum}
SELECT report FROM pageon.comment WHERE num = #{num}
mapper.update: UPDATE pageon.comment SET report = 1 WHERE num = #{num}
